global.title: New Module: BuffManager
global.description: Updated to version latest. Added 3 commands: `buffplayer`, `debuffplayer`, `getbuff`. Added 1 hook: `Auto-Apply Buff Packages` (player-connected). Added 1 scheduled task: `check Buff Packages`. New permission: `BUFF_ADMIN`. New configuration options: `buffPackages`, `maintenanceEnabled`, `maintenanceInterval`.

details.name: buffplayer
details.description: Admin command to apply a buff package to any player

details.name: debuffplayer
details.description: Remove buff tracking from a player. If packageName is not specified, removes all buffs. Usage: /debuffplayer <playerName> [packageName]

details.name: getbuff
details.description: Apply a buff package to yourself. Use /getbuff <packageName> or just /getbuff to see available packages

details.name: BUFF_ADMIN
details.description: Can manage and apply any buff package

details.name: buffPackages
details.description: Define unlimited buff packages. Each package can have its own role requirements, duration, and cost.

details.name: maintenanceEnabled
details.description: Periodically re-apply active (non-expired) buffs to keep them running

details.name: maintenanceInterval
details.description: Cron expression for maintenance frequency (default: every 15 minutes)

global.title: New Module: HordeNightWarnings
global.description: Updated to version latest. Added 1 hook: `BM_is_over` (log). Added 1 scheduled task: `horde_night_warning`. New configuration options: `StartTime1`, `StartTime2`, `SoftWarningText`, `SeriousWarningText`, `discordChannel`, `debugChannel`, `bloodMoonOverText`, `enableDebugMessages`.

details.name: StartTime1
details.description:
In-game time that 'soft' warnings should begin.  Hour only.  e.g. 9 or 15
Default: 0 - Will play all day leading up to blood moon

details.name: StartTime2
details.description:
In-game time that 'serious' warnings should begin.  Hour only.  e.g. 9 or 15
Default: 17 - Will broadcast from 5pm in-game.  If everyone logs out by 5pm, BM fighters will have 5 in-game hours to do last minute prep.

details.name: SoftWarningText
details.description: Text for 'soft' warning message.  e.g. "Blood moon tonight.  Please log out before 17:00 if you're not going to fight the horde."

details.name: SeriousWarningText
details.description: Text for 'serious' warning message.  e.g. "[FF1111]Blood moon soon![-]  Log out NOW if you're not going to fight the horde."

details.name: discordChannel
details.description: Specify the target discord Channel ID for alerts

details.name: debugChannel
details.description: Specify the target discord Channel ID for debug messages

details.name: bloodMoonOverText
details.description: Text to display when bloodmoon ends.

details.name: enableDebugMessages
details.description: If enabled, the script will send debug messages to the specified debugChannel

global.title: New Module: RegionResetRandomiser
global.description: Updated to version latest. Added 1 hook: `randomiseResetRegions` (discord-message). Added 1 scheduled task: `randomiseResetRegions`. New configuration options: `resetQuantity`, `debugChannel`, `authorisedPlayer`, `activationPhrase`, `sendDebugMessages`.

details.name: resetQuantity
details.description:
(Required) Specify the number of regions to randomly selected for reset.
Must be fewer than the total number of flagged regions.

details.name: debugChannel
details.description: (Optional) Supply a discord channel ID to receive debug activity messages.

details.name: authorisedPlayer
details.description:
People authorised to manually execute the hook via the discord debugChannel. Separate with commas. e.g.:  Trevor, Barry, John

Tested OK with unicode like üÜÉüÜÅüÖ¥üÜÖüÖæüÜÅ

Not tested with odd symbols like: ‚òï Catalysm

details.name: activationPhrase
details.description: To manually trigger this module, the authorised person(s) can type this keyphrase into the Discord debugChannel specified above.  e.g.: reset-regions

details.name: sendDebugMessages
details.description:
If enabled, debug messages will be sent to the debugChannel.

The listening channel for keyphrase triggering is specified separately in the hook, below.

global.title: New Module: AFKChecker
global.description: Updated to version 1.0.0. Added 1 scheduled task: `afkChecker`. New permission: `AFK_IMMUNITY`. New configuration options: `minutesBeforeKick`, `maxAfkChecks`, `kickMessage`, `sendWarning`, `warningMessage`, `globalAnnouncement`.

details.name: AFK_IMMUNITY
details.description: Players with this permission will not be kicked for being AFK.

details.name: minutesBeforeKick
details.description: Time in minutes between each AFK check. This should match your cronjob schedule (for example, if your cronjob runs every 5 minutes, set this to 5). Total AFK time before kick will be (Minutes Between Checks √ó Maximum AFK Checks).

details.name: maxAfkChecks
details.description: Number of consecutive AFK checks before a player is kicked. Total AFK time will be (Minutes Between Checks √ó Maximum AFK Checks). For example, with 5 minutes between checks and  3 max checks, players will be kicked after 15 minutes of being AFK.

details.name: kickMessage
details.description: Message shown to the player when they are kicked for being AFK. You can use {minutesAfk} and {minutesUntilKick} placeholders.

details.name: sendWarning
details.description: Whether to send a warning to players before kicking them for being AFK

details.name: warningMessage
details.description: Message sent to warn players before they are kicked for being AFK. You can use {minutesAfk} and {minutesUntilKick} placeholders.

details.name: globalAnnouncement
details.description: Whether to announce AFK warnings and kicks to all players on the server

global.title: New Module: VotingSystem
global.description: Updated to version latest. Added 1 command: `vote`. New configuration options: `votingsite`, `votekey`, `novote`, `alreadyclaimed`, `privatemessage`, `publicmessage`, `currency`, `randomitemnumber`, `randomitemlist`, `fixedrewards`.

details.name: vote
details.description: Claim rewards for voting for the server

details.name: votingsite
votekey
details.description: Vote key provided by the voting site

details.name: novote
details.description: Message to send to the player when voting site reports no vote was cast.

details.name: alreadyclaimed
details.description: Message to send to the player when the voting site reports the vote reward was already claimed.

details.name: privatemessage
details.description:
Optional message to send to the player when the voting site reports a vote with no reward claimed yet. 
Example: Thanks for voting.
Leave it blank if you want nothing to be sent instead.

details.name: publicmessage
details.description:
Optional message to broadcast to all players online when vote is successful. Use {name} in the message to refer to the player name.
Example: [00FF00]{name}[-] voted at 7daystodie-servers.com and was rewarded Takaro Coins!
Leave it blank if you want nothing to be sent instead.

details.name: currency
details.description:
How much currency to add to the player in Takaro, if any.
Make sure to enable economy for this server.

details.name: randomitemnumber
details.description:
Defines how many random items will be rewarded to the player, picked from randomitemlist config field.
The quantities for each item picked is defined on the mentioned config field.

details.name: randomitemlist
details.description: List of items that will be used to select a random reward for the vote, as many times as defined at randomitemnumber.

details.name: fixedrewards
details.description: All the items in this list will be given as a reward for the vote.

global.title: New Module: 7dtd_ChatBridge
global.description: Updated to version latest. Added 6 hooks: `GameToDiscord` (chat-message), `DiscordToGame` (discord-message), `PlayerDisconnected` (player-disconnected), `resetRegions` (log), `serverStatusChange` (server-status-changed), `PlayerConnected` (player-connected). Added 1 scheduled task: `serverStatus`. Added 1 function: `utils`. New configuration options: `sendPlayerConnected`, `sendPlayerDisconnected`, `includePartyChat`, `includeFriendsChat`, `filterCommands`, `commandPrefixes`, `filterSystemMessages`, `useMonitoring`, `monitoringChannelId`, `showPlayerDetails`.

details.name: sendPlayerConnected
details.description: Send a notification to Discord when a player connects to the server.

details.name: sendPlayerDisconnected
details.description: Send a notification to Discord when a player disconnects from the server.

details.name: includePartyChat
details.description: When enabled (true), party/team chat messages will be sent to Discord.

details.name: includeFriendsChat
details.description: When enabled (true), friends chat messages will be sent to Discord.

details.name: filterCommands
details.description: When enabled (true), command messages starting with command prefixes will NOT be sent to Discord.

details.name: commandPrefixes
details.description: List of prefixes that identify commands to filter (e.g., '/', '$', '#'). Only used if Filter Commands is enabled.

details.name: filterSystemMessages
details.description: When enabled, messages that don't come from actual players (such as server announcements, automated notifications, death messages, and other game-generated text) will NOT be sent to the main Discord channel. These system messages will still be visible in the monitoring channel if monitoring is enabled.

details.name: useMonitoring
details.description: When enabled (true), filtered messages will be sent to a separate monitoring channel.

details.name: monitoringChannelId
details.description: Discord channel ID for monitoring messages. Required if monitoring is enabled.

details.name: showPlayerDetails
details.description: Show Steam profile and Takaro profile links in join/leave notifications.

global.title: New Module: Trevor_HordeNightWarnings
global.description: Updated to version latest. Added 1 hook: `BM_is_over` (log). Added 1 scheduled task: `horde_night_warning`. New configuration options: `StartTime1`, `StartTime2`, `SoftWarningText`, `SeriousWarningText`, `discordChannel`, `debugChannel`, `bloodMoonOverText`, `enableDebugMessages`.

details.name: StartTime1
details.description:
In-game time that 'soft' warnings should begin.  Hour only.  e.g. 9 or 15
Default: 0 - Will play all day leading up to blood moon

details.name: StartTime2
details.description:
In-game time that 'serious' warnings should begin.  Hour only.  e.g. 9 or 15
Default: 17 - Will broadcast from 5pm in-game.  If everyone logs out by 5pm, BM fighters will have 5 in-game hours to do last minute prep.

details.name: SoftWarningText
details.description: Text for 'soft' warning message.  e.g. "Blood moon tonight.  Please log out before 17:00 if you're not going to fight the horde."

details.name: SeriousWarningText
details.description: Text for 'serious' warning message.  e.g. "[FF1111]Blood moon soon![-]  Log out NOW if you're not going to fight the horde."

details.name: discordChannel
details.description: Specify the target discord Channel ID for alerts

details.name: debugChannel
details.description: Specify the target discord Channel ID for debug messages

details.name: bloodMoonOverText
details.description: Text to display when bloodmoon ends.

details.name: enableDebugMessages
details.description: If enabled, the script will send debug messages to the specified debugChannel

details.name: resetQuantity
details.description:
(Required) Specify the number of regions to randomly selected for reset.
Must be fewer than the total number of flagged regions.

details.name: debugChannel
details.description: (Optional) Supply a discord channel ID to receive debug activity messages.

details.name: authorisedPlayer
details.description:
People authorised to manually execute the hook via the discord debugChannel. Separate with commas. e.g.:  Trevor, Barry, John

Tested OK with unicode like üÜÉüÜÅüÖ¥üÜÖüÖæüÜÅ

Not tested with odd symbols like: ‚òï Catalysm

details.name: activationPhrase
details.description: To manually trigger this module, the authorised person(s) can type this keyphrase into the Discord debugChannel specified above.  e.g.: reset-regions

details.name: sendDebugMessages
details.description:
If enabled, debug messages will be sent to the debugChannel.

The listening channel for keyphrase triggering is specified separately in the hook, below.

New configuration options: `sendPlayerConnected`, `sendPlayerDisconnected`, `includePartyChat`, `includeFriendsChat`, `filterCommands`, `commandPrefixes`, `filterSystemMessages`, `useMonitoring`, `monitoringChannelId`, `showPlayerDetails`.

details.name: sendPlayerConnected
details.description: Send a notification to Discord when a player connects to the server.

details.name: sendPlayerDisconnected
details.description: Send a notification to Discord when a player disconnects from the server.

details.name: includePartyChat
details.description: When enabled (true), party/team chat messages will be sent to Discord.

details.name: includeFriendsChat
details.description: When enabled (true), friends chat messages will be sent to Discord.

details.name: filterCommands
details.description: When enabled (true), command messages starting with command prefixes will NOT be sent to Discord.

details.name: commandPrefixes
details.description: List of prefixes that identify commands to filter (e.g., '/', '$', '#'). Only used if Filter Commands is enabled.

details.name: filterSystemMessages
details.description: When enabled, messages that don't come from actual players (such as server announcements, automated notifications, death messages, and other game-generated text) will NOT be sent to the main Discord channel. These system messages will still be visible in the monitoring channel if monitoring is enabled.

details.name: useMonitoring
details.description: When enabled (true), filtered messages will be sent to a separate monitoring channel.

details.name: monitoringChannelId
details.description: Discord channel ID for monitoring messages. Required if monitoring is enabled.

details.name: showPlayerDetails
details.description: Show Steam profile and Takaro profile links in join/leave notifications.

global.title: New Module: Limon_AFKChecker
global.description: Updated to version 1.0.0. Added 1 scheduled task: `afkChecker`. New permission: `AFK_IMMUNITY`. New configuration options: `minutesBeforeKick`, `maxAfkChecks`, `kickMessage`, `sendWarning`, `warningMessage`, `globalAnnouncement`.

details.name: AFK_IMMUNITY
details.description: Players with this permission will not be kicked for being AFK.

details.name: minutesBeforeKick
details.description: Time in minutes between each AFK check. This should match your cronjob schedule (for example, if your cronjob runs every 5 minutes, set this to 5). Total AFK time before kick will be (Minutes Between Checks √ó Maximum AFK Checks).

details.name: maxAfkChecks
details.description: Number of consecutive AFK checks before a player is kicked. Total AFK time will be (Minutes Between Checks √ó Maximum AFK Checks). For example, with 5 minutes between checks and  3 max checks, players will be kicked after 15 minutes of being AFK.

details.name: kickMessage
details.description: Message shown to the player when they are kicked for being AFK. You can use {minutesAfk} and {minutesUntilKick} placeholders.

details.name: sendWarning
details.description: Whether to send a warning to players before kicking them for being AFK

details.name: warningMessage
details.description: Message sent to warn players before they are kicked for being AFK. You can use {minutesAfk} and {minutesUntilKick} placeholders.

details.name: globalAnnouncement
details.description: Whether to announce AFK warnings and kicks to all players on the server

details.name: vote
details.description: Claim rewards for voting for the server

details.name: votingsite
votekey
details.description: Vote key provided by the voting site

details.name: novote
details.description: Message to send to the player when voting site reports no vote was cast.

details.name: alreadyclaimed
details.description: Message to send to the player when the voting site reports the vote reward was already claimed.

details.name: privatemessage
details.description:
Optional message to send to the player when the voting site reports a vote with no reward claimed yet. 
Example: Thanks for voting.
Leave it blank if you want nothing to be sent instead.

details.name: publicmessage
details.description:
Optional message to broadcast to all players online when vote is successful. Use {name} in the message to refer to the player name.
Example: [00FF00]{name}[-] voted at 7daystodie-servers.com and was rewarded Takaro Coins!
Leave it blank if you want nothing to be sent instead.

details.name: currency
details.description:
How much currency to add to the player in Takaro, if any.
Make sure to enable economy for this server.

details.name: randomitemnumber
details.description:
Defines how many random items will be rewarded to the player, picked from randomitemlist config field.
The quantities for each item picked is defined on the mentioned config field.

details.name: randomitemlist
details.description: List of items that will be used to select a random reward for the vote, as many times as defined at randomitemnumber.

details.name: fixedrewards
details.description: All the items in this list will be given as a reward for the vote.

global.title: New Module: Limon_AFKChecker
global.description: Updated to version 1.0.0. Added 1 scheduled task: `afkChecker`. New permission: `AFK_IMMUNITY`. New configuration options: `minutesBeforeKick`, `maxAfkChecks`, `kickMessage`, `sendWarning`, `warningMessage`, `globalAnnouncement`.

details.name: AFK_IMMUNITY
details.description: Players with this permission will not be kicked for being AFK.

details.name: minutesBeforeKick
details.description: Time in minutes between each AFK check. This should match your cronjob schedule (for example, if your cronjob runs every 5 minutes, set this to 5). Total AFK time before kick will be (Minutes Between Checks √ó Maximum AFK Checks).

details.name: maxAfkChecks
details.description: Number of consecutive AFK checks before a player is kicked. Total AFK time will be (Minutes Between Checks √ó Maximum AFK Checks). For example, with 5 minutes between checks and 3 max checks, players will be kicked after 15 minutes of being AFK.

details.name: kickMessage
details.description: Message shown to the player when they are kicked for being AFK. You can use {minutesAfk} and {minutesUntilKick} placeholders.

details.name: sendWarning
details.description: Whether to send a warning to players before kicking them for being AFK

details.name: warningMessage
details.description: Message sent to warn players before they are kicked for being AFK. You can use {minutesAfk} and {minutesUntilKick} placeholders.

details.name: globalAnnouncement
details.description: Whether to announce AFK warnings and kicks to all players on the server

global.title: New Module: R20_VotingSystem
global.description: Updated to version latest. Added 1 command: `vote`. New configuration options: `votingsite`, `votekey`, `novote`, `alreadyclaimed`, `privatemessage`, `publicmessage`, `currency`, `randomitemnumber`, `randomitemlist`, `fixedrewards`.

details.name: vote
details.description: Claim rewards for voting for the server

details.name: votingsite
votekey
details.description: Vote key provided by the voting site

details.name: novote
details.description: Message to send to the player when voting site reports no vote was cast.

details.name: alreadyclaimed
details.description: Message to send to the player when the voting site reports the vote reward was already claimed.

details.name: privatemessage
details.description:
Optional message to send to the player when the voting site reports a vote with no reward claimed yet. 
Example: Thanks for voting.
Leave it blank if you want nothing to be sent instead.

details.name: publicmessage
details.description:
Optional message to broadcast to all players online when vote is successful. Use {name} in the message to refer to the player name.
Example: [00FF00]{name}[-] voted at 7daystodie-servers.com and was rewarded Takaro Coins!
Leave it blank if you want nothing to be sent instead.

details.name: currency
details.description:
How much currency to add to the player in Takaro, if any.
Make sure to enable economy for this server.

details.name: randomitemnumber
details.description:
Defines how many random items will be rewarded to the player, picked from randomitemlist config field.
The quantities for each item picked is defined on the mentioned config field.

details.name: randomitemlist
details.description: List of items that will be used to select a random reward for the vote, as many times as defined at randomitemnumber.

details.name: fixedrewards
details.description: All the items in this list will be given as a reward for the vote.

global.title: New Module: Trevor_HordeNightWarnings
global.description: Updated to version latest. Added 1 hook: `BM_is_over` (log). Added 1 scheduled task: `horde_night_warning`. New configuration options: `StartTime1`, `StartTime2`, `SoftWarningText`, `SeriousWarningText`, `discordChannel`, `debugChannel`, `bloodMoonOverText`.

details.name: StartTime1
details.description:
In-game time that 'soft' warnings should begin.  Hour only.  e.g. 9 or 15
Default: 0 - Will play all day leading up to blood moon

details.name: StartTime2
details.description:
In-game time that 'serious' warnings should begin.  Hour only.  e.g. 9 or 15
Default: 17 - Will broadcast from 5pm in-game.  If everyone logs out by 5pm, BM fighters will have 5 in-game hours to do last minute prep.

details.name: SoftWarningText
details.description: Text for 'soft' warning message.  e.g. "Blood moon tonight.  Please log out before 17:00 if you're not going to fight the horde."

details.name: SeriousWarningText
details.description: Text for 'serious' warning message.  e.g. "[FF1111]Blood moon soon![-]  Log out NOW if you're not going to fight the horde."

details.name: discordChannel
details.description: Specify the target discord Channel ID for alerts

details.name: debugChannel
details.description: Specify the target discord Channel ID for debug messages

details.name: bloodMoonOverText
details.description: Text to display when bloodmoon ends.

details.description:
People authorised to manually execute the hook via the discord debugChannel. Separate with commas. e.g.:  Trevor, Barry, John

Tested OK with unicode like üÜÉüÜÅüÖ¥üÜÖüÖæüÜÅ

Not tested with odd symbols like: ‚òï Catalysm

details.name: activationPhrase
details.description: To manually trigger this module, the authorised person(s) can type this keyphrase into the Discord debugChannel specified above.  e.g.: reset-regions

details.name: sendDebugMessages
details.description:

The listening channel for keyphrase triggering is specified separately in the hook, below.

HordeNightWarnings.title: New Module: HordeNightWarnings
HordeNightWarnings.description: Updated to version latest. Added 1 hook: `BM_is_over` (log). Added 1 scheduled task: `horde_night_warning`. New configuration options: `StartTime1`, `StartTime2`, `SoftWarningText`, `SeriousWarningText`, `discordChannel`, `debugChannel`, `bloodMoonOverText`, `enableDebugMessages`.

details.name: StartTime1
details.description:
In-game time that 'soft' warnings should begin.  Hour only.  e.g. 9 or 15
Default: 0 - Will play all day leading up to blood moon

details.name: StartTime2
details.description:
In-game time that 'serious' warnings should begin.  Hour only.  e.g. 9 or 15
Default: 17 - Will broadcast from 5pm in-game.  If everyone logs out by 5pm, BM fighters will have 5 in-game hours to do last minute prep.

details.name: SoftWarningText
details.description: Text for 'soft' warning message.  e.g. "Blood moon tonight.  Please log out before 17:00 if you're not going to fight the horde."

details.name: SeriousWarningText
details.description: Text for 'serious' warning message.  e.g. "[FF1111]Blood moon soon![-]  Log out NOW if you're not going to fight the horde."

details.name: discordChannel
details.description: Specify the target discord Channel ID for alerts

details.name: debugChannel
details.description: Specify the target discord Channel ID for debug messages

details.name: bloodMoonOverText
details.description: Text to display when bloodmoon ends.

details.name: enableDebugMessages
details.description: If enabled, the script will send debug messages to the specified debugChannel

RegionResetRandomiser.title: New Module: RegionResetRandomiser
RegionResetRandomiser.description: Updated to version latest. Added 1 hook: `randomiseResetRegions` (discord-message). Added 1 scheduled task: `randomiseResetRegions`. New configuration options: `resetQuantity`, `debugChannel`, `authorisedPlayer`, `activationPhrase`, `sendDebugMessages`.

details.name: resetQuantity
details.description:
(Required) Specify the number of regions to randomly selected for reset.
Must be fewer than the total number of flagged regions.

details.name: debugChannel
details.description: (Optional) Supply a discord channel ID to receive debug activity messages.

details.name: authorisedPlayer
details.description:
People authorised to manually execute the hook via the discord debugChannel. Separate with commas. e.g.:  Trevor, Barry, John

Tested OK with unicode like üÜÉüÜÅüÖ¥üÜÖüÖæüÜÅ

Not tested with odd symbols like: ‚òï Catalysm

details.name: activationPhrase
details.description: To manually trigger this module, the authorised person(s) can type this keyphrase into the Discord debugChannel specified above.  e.g.: reset-regions

details.name: sendDebugMessages
details.description:
If enabled, debug messages will be sent to the debugChannel.

The listening channel for keyphrase triggering is specified separately in the hook, below.

AFKChecker.description: Updated to version 1.0.0. Added 1 scheduled task: `afkChecker`. New permission: `AFK_IMMUNITY`. New configuration options: `minutesBeforeKick`, `maxAfkChecks`, `kickMessage`, `sendWarning`, `warningMessage`, `globalAnnouncement`.

details.name: AFK_IMMUNITY
details.description: Players with this permission will not be kicked for being AFK.

details.name: minutesBeforeKick
details.description: Time in minutes between each AFK check. This should match your cronjob schedule (for example, if your cronjob runs every 5 minutes, set this to 5). Total AFK time before kick will be (Minutes Between Checks √ó Maximum AFK Checks).

details.name: maxAfkChecks
details.description: Number of consecutive AFK checks before a player is kicked. Total AFK time will be (Minutes Between Checks √ó Maximum AFK Checks). For example, with 5 minutes between checks and  3 max checks, players will be kicked after 15 minutes of being AFK.

details.name: kickMessage
details.description: Message shown to the player when they are kicked for being AFK. You can use {minutesAfk} and {minutesUntilKick} placeholders.

details.name: sendWarning
details.description: Whether to send a warning to players before kicking them for being AFK

details.name: warningMessage
details.description: Message sent to warn players before they are kicked for being AFK. You can use {minutesAfk} and {minutesUntilKick} placeholders.

details.name: globalAnnouncement
details.description: Whether to announce AFK warnings and kicks to all players on the server

Leave it blank if you want nothing to be sent instead.

details.description:
Optional message to broadcast to all players online when vote is successful. Use {name} in the message to refer to the player name.
Example: [00FF00]{name}[-] voted at 7daystodie-servers.com and was rewarded Takaro Coins!
Leave it blank if you want nothing to be sent instead.

details.description:
How much currency to add to the player in Takaro, if any.
Make sure to enable economy for this server.

details.name: randomitemnumber
details.description:
Defines how many random items will be rewarded to the player, picked from randomitemlist config field.
The quantities for each item picked is defined on the mentioned config field.

details.name: randomitemlist
details.description: List of items that will be used to select a random reward for the vote, as many times as defined at randomitemnumber.

details.name: fixedrewards

StockMarket.title: New Module: StockMarket
StockMarket.description: Updated to version latest. Added 6 commands: `buystock`, `triggerevent`, `sellstock`, `markets`, `stockinfo`, `stockportfolio`. Added 2 scheduled tasks: `updatestockprices`, `marketnews`. New permissions: `STOCK_MARKET_USE`, `STOCK_MARKET_TRADE`, `STOCK_MARKET_BROKER`, `STOCK_MARKET_TRIGGER_EVENT`. New configuration options: `sectors`, `stocks`, `marketEvents`, `eventFrequency`, `defaultEventDuration`, `transactionFee`, `vipDiscount`, `priceAlertThreshold`, `marketNewsChannelId`.

details.name: buystock
details.description: Buy shares of a stock

details.name: triggerevent
details.description: Shows all available market events when run without parameters. Use with an event name (e.g., /triggerevent TECH_BOOM) to trigger a specific market event.

details.name: sellstock
details.description: Sell shares of a stock

details.name: markets
details.description: View stock market prices and activity. Use '/markets ALL' to see all industries, or specify an industry name (e.g., '/markets TECH') to see stocks in that industry only.

details.name: stockinfo
details.description: Shows all available stocks in the market. Use with a ticker symbol (e.g., /stockinfo ticker) to see detailed information about a specific stock.

details.name: stockportfolio
details.description: No help text available

details.name: STOCK_MARKET_USE
details.description: Allows the player to view market prices and their portfolio

details.name: STOCK_MARKET_TRADE
details.description: Allows the player to buy and sell stocks

details.name: STOCK_MARKET_BROKER
details.description: VIP status that reduces transaction fees

details.name: STOCK_MARKET_TRIGGER_EVENT
details.description: Allows admins to manually trigger market events

details.name: sectors
details.description: Define economic sectors relevant to survival in Navezgane

details.name: stocks
details.description: List of stocks representing Navezgane entities and resources

details.name: marketEvents
details.description: Events impacting the Navezgane economy

details.name: eventFrequency
details.description: Average number of update cycles between market events (0 to disable). Depends on mod's update frequency (e.g., per in-game hour?).

details.name: defaultEventDuration
details.description: Default number of update cycles an event lasts.

details.name: transactionFee
details.description: Percentage fee charged on all buy/sell transactions (5 = 5%)

details.name: vipDiscount
details.description: Percentage discount on transaction fees for players with 'STOCK_MARKET_BROKER' permission (50 = 50%)

details.name: priceAlertThreshold
details.description: Percentage change that triggers a market alert (15 = 15%)

details.name: marketNewsChannelId
details.description: The ID of the Discord channel where market news messages should be posted. Leave empty to disable.

dailyRewardsItems.title: New Module: dailyRewardsItems
dailyRewardsItems.description: Updated to version 2.0.0. Added 3 commands: `streak`, `daily`, `topstreak`. Added 1 hook: `dailyLoginCheck` (player-connected). Added 1 function: `utils`. New permissions: `DAILY_CLAIM`, `DAILY_REWARD_MULTIPLIER`. New configuration options: `baseReward`, `maxStreak`, `milestoneRewards`, `possibleItems`, `itemChance`, `useStreakMultiplier`, `streakMultiplierValue`, `maxItemChance`.

details.name: streak
details.description: Check your current daily reward streak and next claim time

details.name: daily
details.description: Claim your daily reward

details.name: topstreak
details.description: Shows the players with highest daily reward streaks

details.name: DAILY_CLAIM
details.description: Allows the player to claim daily rewards

details.name: DAILY_REWARD_MULTIPLIER
details.description: Control the multiplier per role. This is useful to give your donors a little extra. Count is an integer multiplier.

details.name: baseReward
details.description: Base amount of currency given for daily rewards. This is multiplied by streak level.

details.name: maxStreak
details.description: Maximum streak level a player can reach

details.name: milestoneRewards
details.description: Additional rewards for reaching certain streak milestones

details.name: possibleItems
details.description: Items that can be randomly awarded as daily rewards

details.name: itemChance
details.description: Base chance to receive an item (1-100)

details.name: useStreakMultiplier
details.description: Increase the item chance based on player streak

details.name: streakMultiplierValue
details.description: How much to increase item chance per streak day (e.g. 0.5 = +0.5% per day)

details.name: maxItemChance
details.description: Cap for total item chance after streak multiplier (1-100)

7dtd_ChatBridge.title: New Module: 7dtd_ChatBridge
7dtd_ChatBridge.description: Updated to version latest. Added 6 hooks: `GameToDiscord` (chat-message), `DiscordToGame` (discord-message), `PlayerDisconnected` (player-disconnected), `resetRegions` (log), `serverStatusChange` (server-status-changed), `PlayerConnected` (player-connected). Added 1 scheduled task: `serverStatus`. Added 1 function: `utils`. New configuration options: `sendPlayerConnected`, `sendPlayerDisconnected`, `includePartyChat`, `includeFriendsChat`, `filterCommands`, `commandPrefixes`, `filterSystemMessages`, `useMonitoring`, `monitoringChannelId`, `showPlayerDetails`.

details.name: sendPlayerConnected
details.description: Send a notification to Discord when a player connects to the server.

details.name: sendPlayerDisconnected
details.description: Send a notification to Discord when a player disconnects from the server.

details.name: includePartyChat
details.description: When enabled (true), party/team chat messages will be sent to Discord.

details.name: includeFriendsChat
details.description: When enabled (true), friends chat messages will be sent to Discord.

details.name: filterCommands
details.description: When enabled (true), command messages starting with command prefixes will NOT be sent to Discord.

details.name: commandPrefixes
details.description: List of prefixes that identify commands to filter (e.g., '/', '$', '#'). Only used if Filter Commands is enabled.

details.name: filterSystemMessages
details.description: When enabled, messages that don't come from actual players (such as server announcements, automated notifications, death messages, and other game-generated text) will NOT be sent to the main Discord channel. These system messages will still be visible in the monitoring channel if monitoring is enabled.

details.name: useMonitoring
details.description: When enabled (true), filtered messages will be sent to a separate monitoring channel.

details.name: monitoringChannelId
details.description: Discord channel ID for monitoring messages. Required if monitoring is enabled.

details.name: showPlayerDetails
details.description: Show Steam profile and Takaro profile links in join/leave notifications.

details.name: gettranslation
details.description: No help text available

details.name: setlanguage
details.description: No help text available

details.name: TRANSLATE_PERMISSION
details.description: Give players Translate permission

details.name: googleApiKey

details.name: maxMessageLength

details.name: enabledByDefault

details.name: defaultLanguage

details.name: supportedLanguages

R20_VotingSystem.title: New Module: R20_VotingSystem
R20_VotingSystem.description: Updated to version latest. Added 1 command: `vote`. New configuration options: `votingsite`, `votekey`, `novote`, `alreadyclaimed`, `privatemessage`, `publicmessage`, `currency`, `randomitemnumber`, `randomitemlist`, `fixedrewards`.

details.name: vote
details.description: Claim rewards for voting for the server

details.name: votingsite
votekey
details.description: Vote key provided by the voting site

details.name: novote
details.description: Message to send to the player when voting site reports no vote was cast.

details.name: alreadyclaimed
details.description: Message to send to the player when the voting site reports the vote reward was already claimed.

details.name: privatemessage
details.description:
Optional message to send to the player when the voting site reports a vote with no reward claimed yet. 
Example: Thanks for voting.
Leave it blank if you want nothing to be sent instead.

details.name: publicmessage
details.description:
Optional message to broadcast to all players online when vote is successful. Use {name} in the message to refer to the player name.
Example: [00FF00]{name}[-] voted at 7daystodie-servers.com and was rewarded Takaro Coins!
Leave it blank if you want nothing to be sent instead.

details.name: currency
details.description:
How much currency to add to the player in Takaro, if any.
Make sure to enable economy for this server.

details.name: randomitemnumber
details.description:
Defines how many random items will be rewarded to the player, picked from randomitemlist config field.
The quantities for each item picked is defined on the mentioned config field.

details.name: randomitemlist
details.description: List of items that will be used to select a random reward for the vote, as many times as defined at randomitemnumber.

details.name: fixedrewards
details.description: All the items in this list will be given as a reward for the vote.

Trevor_HordeNightWarnings.title: New Module: Trevor_HordeNightWarnings
Trevor_HordeNightWarnings.description: Updated to version latest. Added 1 hook: `BM_is_over` (log). Added 1 scheduled task: `horde_night_warning`. New configuration options: `StartTime1`, `StartTime2`, `SoftWarningText`, `SeriousWarningText`, `discordChannel`, `debugChannel`, `bloodMoonOverText`, `enableDebugMessages`.

details.name: StartTime1
details.description:
In-game time that 'soft' warnings should begin.  Hour only.  e.g. 9 or 15
Default: 0 - Will play all day leading up to blood moon

details.name: StartTime2
details.description:
In-game time that 'serious' warnings should begin.  Hour only.  e.g. 9 or 15
Default: 17 - Will broadcast from 5pm in-game.  If everyone logs out by 5pm, BM fighters will have 5 in-game hours to do last minute prep.

details.name: SoftWarningText
details.description: Text for 'soft' warning message.  e.g. "Blood moon tonight.  Please log out before 17:00 if you're not going to fight the horde."

details.name: SeriousWarningText
details.description: Text for 'serious' warning message.  e.g. "[FF1111]Blood moon soon![-]  Log out NOW if you're not going to fight the horde."

details.name: discordChannel
details.description: Specify the target discord Channel ID for alerts

details.name: debugChannel
details.description: Specify the target discord Channel ID for debug messages

details.name: bloodMoonOverText
details.description: Text to display when bloodmoon ends.

details.name: enableDebugMessages
details.description: If enabled, the script will send debug messages to the specified debugChannel

details.name: enableDebugMessages
details.description: If enabled, the script will send debug messages to the specified debugChannel

details.name: buystock

details.name: sellstock

details.name: markets

Limon_7dtd_ChatBridge.title: New Module: Limon_7dtd_ChatBridge
Limon_7dtd_ChatBridge.description: Updated to version latest. Added 6 hooks: `GameToDiscord` (chat-message), `DiscordToGame` (discord-message), `PlayerDisconnected` (player-disconnected), `resetRegions` (log), `serverStatusChange` (server-status-changed), `PlayerConnected` (player-connected). Added 1 scheduled task: `serverStatus`. Added 1 function: `utils`. New configuration options: `sendPlayerConnected`, `sendPlayerDisconnected`, `includePartyChat`, `includeFriendsChat`, `filterCommands`, `commandPrefixes`, `filterSystemMessages`, `useMonitoring`, `monitoringChannelId`, `showPlayerDetails`.

details.name: sendPlayerConnected
details.description: Send a notification to Discord when a player connects to the server.

details.name: sendPlayerDisconnected
details.description: Send a notification to Discord when a player disconnects from the server.

details.name: includePartyChat
details.description: When enabled (true), party/team chat messages will be sent to Discord.

details.name: includeFriendsChat
details.description: When enabled (true), friends chat messages will be sent to Discord.

details.name: filterCommands
details.description: When enabled (true), command messages starting with command prefixes will NOT be sent to Discord.

details.name: commandPrefixes
details.description: List of prefixes that identify commands to filter (e.g., '/', '$', '#'). Only used if Filter Commands is enabled.

details.name: filterSystemMessages
details.description: When enabled, messages that don't come from actual players (such as server announcements, automated notifications, death messages, and other game-generated text) will NOT be sent to the main Discord channel. These system messages will still be visible in the monitoring channel if monitoring is enabled.

details.name: useMonitoring
details.description: When enabled (true), filtered messages will be sent to a separate monitoring channel.

details.name: monitoringChannelId
details.description: Discord channel ID for monitoring messages. Required if monitoring is enabled.

details.name: showPlayerDetails
details.description: Show Steam profile and Takaro profile links in join/leave notifications.

Limon_AFKChecker.title: New Module: Limon_AFKChecker
Limon_AFKChecker.description: Updated to version 1.0.0. Added 1 scheduled task: `afkChecker`. New permission: `AFK_IMMUNITY`. New configuration options: `minutesBeforeKick`, `maxAfkChecks`, `kickMessage`, `sendWarning`, `warningMessage`, `globalAnnouncement`.

details.name: AFK_IMMUNITY
details.description: Players with this permission will not be kicked for being AFK.

details.name: minutesBeforeKick
details.description: Time in minutes between each AFK check. This should match your cronjob schedule (for example, if your cronjob runs every 5 minutes, set this to 5). Total AFK time before kick will be (Minutes Between Checks √ó Maximum AFK Checks).

details.name: maxAfkChecks
details.description: Number of consecutive AFK checks before a player is kicked. Total AFK time will be (Minutes Between Checks √ó Maximum AFK Checks). For example, with 5 minutes between checks and  3 max checks, players will be kicked after 15 minutes of being AFK.

details.name: kickMessage
details.description: Message shown to the player when they are kicked for being AFK. You can use {minutesAfk} and {minutesUntilKick} placeholders.

details.name: sendWarning
details.description: Whether to send a warning to players before kicking them for being AFK

details.name: warningMessage
details.description: Message sent to warn players before they are kicked for being AFK. You can use {minutesAfk} and {minutesUntilKick} placeholders.

details.name: globalAnnouncement
details.description: Whether to announce AFK warnings and kicks to all players on the server

details.name: BANNED_ITEMS_IMMUNITY
details.description: Players with this permission are immune to all item bans regardless of item permissions

details.name: ALLOW_ITEMS_TIER
details.description: Allow player to possess tier items. the count connected to the item will allow it for that role

details.name: bannedItemsWithPermissions
details.description: List of items that require a specific tier permission to possess. Players need ALLOW_ITEMS_TIER permission with a count equal to or greater than the required tier to possess these items. Players with BANNED_ITEMS_IMMUNITY can possess any items regardless of tier.

details.name: warningsBeforePunishment
details.description: Number of warnings a player receives before punishment is applied

details.name: punishmentType
details.description: What happens when a player has unauthorized items too many times

details.name: banDuration
details.description: How long a player is banned for (if ban is selected)

details.name: kickMessage
details.description: Message to display when a player is kicked (use {items} to list all unauthorized items)

details.name: discordChannelId
details.description: Discord channel ID where notifications about players with banned items will be sent. Leave empty to disable Discord notifications.

details.name: banMessage
details.description: Message to display when a player is banned (use {items} to list all unauthorized items)

Horde Night Warnings.title: New Module: Horde Night Warnings
Horde Night Warnings.description: Updated to version latest. Added 1 hook: `BM_is_over` (log). Added 1 scheduled task: `horde_night_warning`. New configuration options: `StartTime1`, `StartTime2`, `SoftWarningText`, `SeriousWarningText`, `discordChannel`, `debugChannel`, `bloodMoonOverText`.

details.name: StartTime1
details.description:
In-game time that 'soft' warnings should begin.  Hour only.  e.g. 9 or 15
Default: 0 - Will play all day leading up to blood moon

details.name: StartTime2
details.description:
In-game time that 'serious' warnings should begin.  Hour only.  e.g. 9 or 15
Default: 17 - Will broadcast from 5pm in-game.  If everyone logs out by 5pm, BM fighters will have 5 in-game hours to do last minute prep.

details.name: SoftWarningText
details.description: Text for 'soft' warning message.  e.g. "Blood moon tonight.  Please log out before 17:00 if you're not going to fight the horde."

details.name: SeriousWarningText
details.description: Text for 'serious' warning message.  e.g. "[FF1111]Blood moon soon![-]  Log out NOW if you're not going to fight the horde."

details.name: discordChannel
details.description: Specify the target discord Channel ID for alerts

details.name: debugChannel
details.description: Specify the target discord Channel ID for debug messages

details.name: bloodMoonOverText
details.description: Text to display when bloodmoon ends.
